N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 753.1 - Statement of policy and purpose

State Regulations

The Hudson River Park Trust is a body corporate and politic, constituting a public benefit corporation, established by the Hudson River Park

Act, chapter 592 of the Laws of 1998 of the State of New York. This prompt
payment policy is adopted pursuant to section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law, requiring each public benefit corporation to
promulgate rules and regulations detailing its policy with respect to making
prompt payment to contractors. Notes
